chinese: 衡門之下、可以棲遲。泌之洋洋、可以樂飢。
english: Beneath my door made of cross pieces of wood,I can rest at my leisure;By the wimpling stream from my fountain,I can joy amid my hunger.

chinese: 豈其食魚、必河之魴。豈其取妻、必齊之姜。
english: Why, in eating fish;Must we have bream from the He?Why, in taking a wife,Must we have a Jiang of Qi?

chinese: 豈其食魚、必河之鯉。豈其取妻、必宋之子。
english: Why, in eating fish;Must we have carp from the He?Why, in taking a wife,Must we have a Zi of Song?
